title: Stunning Video From A COVID Hearing Exposes The Hard Truth (Ep 1691)
description:
Doctors reveal the shocking reason mandate exemptions aren’t being approved. In this episode, I address the scandal. 

News Picks:

More evidence that the growing surveillance state is out of control.

About those “fact-checkers.” 

This sounds an awful lot like inciting violence. 


More discrimination on college campuses?

Is Russia planning to use our Desert Storm model in Ukraine? 

Are we being told the whole story about those lab monkeys?
